column5: Posting a live fish out of water can get you sued! Now fish in Switzerland have lawyers. here Just imagine; you hook into a fish and the Game Warden starts his stop watch - time to stock up on 150 lb braid and 0X leaders.  Dan
wonder if they'll be allowed to testify on their own behalf  lol serisouly, we'll have to start hunting lawyers...... instead of an animal call, we could use an ambulance siren  lol ok...I'm done now
You guys do know that there is a mod here who is a lawyer right? And if he every figures out the Mod Q thing, you guys could be in trouble.

I object to that! I am a lawyer and I'm no bottom feeder. I suspend alot, but I don't bottom feed...leave it to the Swiss...I'm on record as being all for pike abuse..with a Williams Wobbler of course...

Thats crazy. wow. I guess get the 100lb line and get that fish outta the water ASAP. or dont fish. SWISS YOUR ALL FUDGED IN THE HEAD! PAYING LAWYERS OUTTA TAX MONEY TO REPRESENT FISH! I BET THAT LAWYER EATS FISH AT LEAST ONCE A MONTH. AHHHH.. my vent is done

In Switzerland, their states or provinces are called cantons. This happened in the canton of Zurich. They are very independent. In one of them women did not get the vote until the 70's or 80's. They come up with all kinds of weird laws because of their political set up.
Why must you idiots always give fish mammalian brains!
